languages.text: {n}Долговязый изможденный офицер с впалыми щеками испуганно смотрит на вас. Его тело трясется, словно от озноба, а глаза беспокойно мечутся из стороны в сторону.{/n} "В-в-ваша Светлость В-вольный Торговец, что п-привело вас на наше скромное судно?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Долговязый изможденный офицер с впалыми щеками испуганно смотрит на вас. Его тело трясется, словно от озноба, а глаза беспокойно мечутся из стороны в сторону.{/n} "В-в-ваша Светлость В-вольный Торговец, что п-привело вас на наше скромное судно?"
traits.speaker: OfficerInTerror

languages.text: {n}The lanky, haggard-looking officer with sunken cheeks stares at you in fright. His body is shivering as if from a feverish chill and his eyes are darting back and forth anxiously.{/n} "Y-Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} Rogue T-Trader, what b-brings you to our humble ship?"
languages.original_text: {n}Долговязый изможденный офицер с впалыми щеками испуганно смотрит на вас. Его тело трясется, словно от озноба, а глаза беспокойно мечутся из стороны в сторону.{/n} "В-в-ваша Светлость В-вольный Торговец, что п-привело вас на наше скромное судно?"

traits.locale_text: {n}The lanky, haggard-looking officer with sunken cheeks stares at you in fright. His body is shivering as if from a feverish chill and his eyes are darting back and forth anxiously.{/n} "Y-Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} Rogue T-Trader, what b-brings you to our humble ship?"
traits.speaker: OfficerInTerror

languages.text: {n}L'officier dégingandé, à l'air hagard et aux joues creuses, vous regarde avec effroi. Son corps est parcouru de frissons comme s'il était sous l'emprise de la fièvre, et ses yeux vont et viennent avec anxiété.{/n} « V-Votre Seigneurie, que nous vaut la visite d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} à bord de cet humble vaisseau ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The lanky, haggard-looking officer with sunken cheeks stares at you in fright. His body is shivering as if from a feverish chill and his eyes are darting back and forth anxiously.{/n} "Y-Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} Rogue T-Trader, what b-brings you to our humble ship?"

traits.locale_text: {n}L'officier dégingandé, à l'air hagard et aux joues creuses, vous regarde avec effroi. Son corps est parcouru de frissons comme s'il était sous l'emprise de la fièvre, et ses yeux vont et viennent avec anxiété.{/n} « V-Votre Seigneurie, que nous vaut la visite d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} à bord de cet humble vaisseau ? »
traits.speaker: OfficerInTerror

languages.text: {n}这位身材瘦削，满脸憔悴的军官惊恐地盯着你。他的身体颤抖着，仿佛发了烧一样抖个不停。他的双眼不断地来回打量着你。{/n}“行……行商浪人大……大人，是什……什么风把您吹到了我们这艘卑微的船上？”
languages.original_text: {n}The lanky, haggard-looking officer with sunken cheeks stares at you in fright. His body is shivering as if from a feverish chill and his eyes are darting back and forth anxiously.{/n} "Y-Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} Rogue T-Trader, what b-brings you to our humble ship?"

traits.locale_text: {n}这位身材瘦削，满脸憔悴的军官惊恐地盯着你。他的身体颤抖着，仿佛发了烧一样抖个不停。他的双眼不断地来回打量着你。{/n}“行……行商浪人大……大人，是什……什么风把您吹到了我们这艘卑微的船上？”
traits.speaker: OfficerInTerror

languages.text: {n}頬のこけた、小柄でやせた感じの将校が、怯えてあなたを見つめている。彼の身体は熱病にかかったように震え、目は不安げに前後左右に揺れ動いている。{/n}「じ、自由開拓者…陛下。こ…このような粗末な船に何の用でいらしたのですか？」
languages.original_text: {n}The lanky, haggard-looking officer with sunken cheeks stares at you in fright. His body is shivering as if from a feverish chill and his eyes are darting back and forth anxiously.{/n} "Y-Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} Rogue T-Trader, what b-brings you to our humble ship?"

traits.locale_text: {n}頬のこけた、小柄でやせた感じの将校が、怯えてあなたを見つめている。彼の身体は熱病にかかったように震え、目は不安げに前後左右に揺れ動いている。{/n}「じ、自由開拓者…陛下。こ…このような粗末な船に何の用でいらしたのですか？」
traits.speaker: OfficerInTerror

languages.text: {n}Der hagere, ausgemergelte Offizier mit eingefallenen Wangen starrt dich aufgeschreckt an. Sein Körper zittert, als hätte er einen Fieberschauer, und seine Augen huschen ängstlich hin und her.{/n} "Eu-Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, {mf|Freihä-händler|Freihä-händlerin}, was f-führt Euch auf unser bescheidenes Schiff?"
languages.original_text: {n}The lanky, haggard-looking officer with sunken cheeks stares at you in fright. His body is shivering as if from a feverish chill and his eyes are darting back and forth anxiously.{/n} "Y-Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} Rogue T-Trader, what b-brings you to our humble ship?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der hagere, ausgemergelte Offizier mit eingefallenen Wangen starrt dich aufgeschreckt an. Sein Körper zittert, als hätte er einen Fieberschauer, und seine Augen huschen ängstlich hin und her.{/n} "Eu-Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, {mf|Freihä-händler|Freihä-händlerin}, was f-führt Euch auf unser bescheidenes Schiff?"
traits.speaker: OfficerInTerror

languages.text: {n}El esmirriado oficial, de aspecto demacrado y pómulos hundidos, te mira con los ojos muy abiertos por el pánico. Tirita como si tuviese fiebre, y no deja de mirar nerviosamente de aquí para allá.{/n} «M-mi{mf|lord|lady} Comerciante Independiente, ¿qué le trae a nuestra humilde nave?».
languages.original_text: {n}The lanky, haggard-looking officer with sunken cheeks stares at you in fright. His body is shivering as if from a feverish chill and his eyes are darting back and forth anxiously.{/n} "Y-Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} Rogue T-Trader, what b-brings you to our humble ship?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El esmirriado oficial, de aspecto demacrado y pómulos hundidos, te mira con los ojos muy abiertos por el pánico. Tirita como si tuviese fiebre, y no deja de mirar nerviosamente de aquí para allá.{/n} «M-mi{mf|lord|lady} Comerciante Independiente, ¿qué le trae a nuestra humilde nave?».
traits.speaker: OfficerInTerror

languages.text: {n}Sırığı andıran, bezgin ve yanakları çökmüş subay, dehşet içinde sana bakıyor. Vücudu üşütüp ateşi çıkmışçasına titrerken gözleri de fellik fellik dolaşıyor.{/n} "L... {mf|Lord|Leydi} H... Hür Tacir Hazretleri! Sizi naçizane gemimize hangi rüzgâr attı?"
languages.original_text: {n}The lanky, haggard-looking officer with sunken cheeks stares at you in fright. His body is shivering as if from a feverish chill and his eyes are darting back and forth anxiously.{/n} "Y-Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} Rogue T-Trader, what b-brings you to our humble ship?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sırığı andıran, bezgin ve yanakları çökmüş subay, dehşet içinde sana bakıyor. Vücudu üşütüp ateşi çıkmışçasına titrerken, gözleri de fellik fellik dolaşıyor.{/n} "H... Hür Tacir L... {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Naçizane gemimize sizi hangi rüzgâr attı?"
traits.speaker: OfficerInTerror
